attributes.action: Less rates more positive planning permissions to our Equestrian business
attributes.background: Riding schools are being taken out of business due to rates and planning permissions for indoor arenas and outdoor arenas are most of the time rejected. Equestrian will keep many young people off the streets,will bring in millions and millions to the country supporting the Countryside and Farmers.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
